trial_identification.studytitle: Effect of a short post-operative course of oral prednisone on post-operative morbidity following tonsillectomy in children.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Effect of a short post-operative course of oral prednisone versus placebo on post-operative morbidity following tonsillectomy in children.

ethicsAndSummary.summary: The purpose of the study is to see if a short course of a steroid mediation given post-operatively improves recovery after tonsillectomy in children. We hypothesize that oral prednisolone may be of benefit as an equivalent intravenous medication given at the time of tonsillectomy has been shown to be of benefit.
